category: news
title: "You don't need an GeForce RTX GPU to access RTX Voice, after all"
excerpt: "This app claims to use AI to reduce or outright cancel microphone background noise, and it was only intended to function for RTX card owners. However, as per the usual, the internet has circumvented those limitations. A user over on the Guru3D forums discovered that RTX Voice works \"just fine\" without a pricey RTX GPU in your system."
